sqlMap.select: SELECT PARAM_ID, PARAM_NAME, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') UPDATE_DATE, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') CREATE_DATE FROM T02_DATA_PARAM P where 1=1 and PARAM_NAME like '%'||#paramName#||'%' order by UPDATE_DATE desc
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T02_DATA_PARAM P where 1=1 and PARAM_NAME like '%'||#paramName#||'%'
sqlMap.insert: insert into T02_DATA_PARAM (PARAM_ID, PARAM_NAME, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE) VALUES ('$paramId$', '$paramName$', sysdate, sysdate)
